meanings.sent1: The blue shirt is the washiest of all the shirts.
meanings.sent2: She always chooses the washiest detergent for her laundry.
meanings.sent3: The washiest towel in the house is the one the dog always uses.
meanings.sent4: After the rain, the sky turned the washiest shade of pink.
meanings.sent5: The washiest car in the parking lot sparkled in the sunlight.
